verses.verse: גֶּ֤פֶן <WH1612> vine בּוֹקֵק֙ <WH1238> [is] an empty יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel פְּרִ֖י <WH6529> fruit יְשַׁוֶּה־ <WH7737> he bringeth forth לּ֑וֹ כְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> unto himself according to the multitude לְפִרְי֗וֹ <WH6529> of his fruit הִרְבָּה֙ <WH7235> he hath increased לַֽמִּזְבְּח֔וֹת <WH4196> the altars כְּט֣וֹב <WH2896> according to the goodness לְאַרְצ֔וֹ <WH776> of his land הֵיטִ֖יבוּ <WH3190> the better מַצֵּבֽוֹת׃ <WH4676> images

חָלַ֥ק <WH2505> is divided לִבָּ֖ם <WH3820> Their heart עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now יֶאְשָׁ֑מוּ <WH816> now shall they be found faulty ה֚וּא <WH1931> the LORD יַעֲרֹ֣ף <WH6202> he shall break down מִזְבְּחוֹתָ֔ם <WH4196> their altars יְשֹׁדֵ֖ד <WH7703> he shall spoil מַצֵּבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4676> their images

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Surely עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <WH559> For now they shall say אֵ֥ין <WH369> have מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> We have no king לָ֑נוּ כִּ֣י <WH3588> Surely לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָרֵ֙אנוּ֙ <WH3372> because we feared אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> not the LORD וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> what then should a king מַה־ <WH4100> what יַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> do לָּֽנוּ׃

דִּבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> They have spoken דְבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> words אָל֥וֹת <WH422> swearing שָׁ֖וְא <WH7723> falsely כָּרֹ֣ת <WH3772> in making בְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> a covenant וּפָרַ֤ח <WH6524> springeth up כָּרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7219> as hemlock מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> thus judgment עַ֖ל <WH5921> in תַּלְמֵ֥י <WH8525> in the furrows שָׂדָֽי׃ <WH7704> of the field

לְעֶגְלוֹת֙ <WH5697> because of the calves בֵּ֣ית אָ֔וֶן <WH1007> of Bethaven יָג֖וּרוּ <WH1481> shall fear שְׁכַ֣ן <WH7934> The inhabitants שֹֽׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria כִּי־ <WH3588> Indeed אָבַ֨ל <WH56> thereof shall mourn עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> over עַמּ֗וֹ <WH5971> for the people וּכְמָרָיו֙ <WH3649> over it and the priests עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> Over יָגִ֔ילוּ <WH1523> thereof [that] rejoiced עַל־ <WH5921> over כְּבוֹד֖וֹ <WH3519> on it for the glory כִּֽי־ <WH3588> since גָלָ֥ה <WH1540> thereof because it is departed מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at

גַּם־ <WH1571> itself אוֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> לְאַשּׁ֣וּר <WH804> unto Assyria יוּבָ֔ל <WH2986> It shall be also carried מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> [for] a present לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to king יָרֵ֑ב <WH3377> Jareb בָּשְׁנָה֙ <WH1317> shame אֶפְרַ֣יִם <WH669> Ephraim יִקָּ֔ח <WH3947> shall receive וְיֵב֥וֹשׁ <WH954> shall be ashamed יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and Israel מֵעֲצָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6098> of his own counsel
נִדְמֶ֥ה <WH1820> is cut off שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> [As for] Samaria מַלְכָּ֑הּ <WH4428> her king כְּקֶ֖צֶף <WH7110> as the foam עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> upon מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> the water

וְנִשְׁמְד֞וּ <WH8045> shall be destroyed בָּמ֣וֹת <WH1116> The high places אָ֗וֶן <WH205> wickedness חַטַּאת֙ <WH2403> the sin יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel ק֣וֹץ <WH6975> the thorn וְדַרְדַּ֔ר <WH1863> and the thistle יַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> shall come up עַל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבְּחוֹתָ֑ם <WH4196> on their altars וְאָמְר֤וּ <WH559> and they shall say לֶֽהָרִים֙ <WH2022> to the mountains כַּסּ֔וּנוּ <WH3680> Cover וְלַגְּבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> us and to the hills נִפְל֥וּ <WH5307> Fall עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> and ס

מִימֵי֙ <WH3117> from the days הַגִּבְעָ֔ה <WH1390> of Gibeah חָטָ֖אתָ <WH2398> thou hast sinned יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> O Israel שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> There עָמָ֔דוּ <WH5975> there they stood לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תַשִּׂיגֵ֧ם <WH5381> did not overtake בַּגִּבְעָ֛ה <WH1390> in Gibeah מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> the battle עַל־ <WH5921> against בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> against the children עַֽלְוָֽה׃ <WH5932> of iniquity

בְּאַוָּתִ֖י <WH185> [It is] in my desire וְאֶסֳּרֵ֑ם <WH3256> that I should chastise וְאֻסְּפ֤וּ <WH622> shall be gathered עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> against עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> them and the people בְּאָסְרָ֖ם <WH631> against them when they shall bind לִשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> themselves in their two [עֵינֹתָם כ] (עֹונֹתָֽם׃ <WH5868> mighty ק)

וְאֶפְרַ֜יִם <WH669> And Ephraim עֶגְלָ֤ה <WH5697> [is as] an heifer מְלֻמָּדָה֙ <WH3925> [that is] taught אֹהַ֣בְתִּי <WH157> [and] loveth לָד֔וּשׁ <WH1758> to tread out וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I עָבַ֔רְתִּי <WH5674> [the corn] but I passed over עַל־ <WH5921> over ט֖וּב <WH2898> upon her fair צַוָּארָ֑הּ <WH6676> neck אַרְכִּ֤יב <WH7392> to ride אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> I will make Ephraim יַחֲר֣וֹשׁ <WH2790> shall plow יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah יְשַׂדֶּד־ <WH7702> shall break his clods ל֖וֹ יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> [and] Jacob

זִרְע֨וּ <WH2232> Sow לָכֶ֤ם לִצְדָקָה֙ <WH6666> to yourselves in righteousness קִצְר֣וּ <WH7114> reap לְפִי־ <WH6310> in חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> mercy נִ֥ירוּ <WH5214> break up לָכֶ֖ם נִ֑יר <WH5215> your fallow ground וְעֵת֙ <WH6256> for [it is] time לִדְר֣וֹשׁ <WH1875> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God עַד־ <WH5704> Until יָב֕וֹא <WH935> till he come וְיֹרֶ֥ה <WH3384> and rain צֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> righteousness לָכֶֽם׃

חֲרַשְׁתֶּם־ <WH2790> Ye have plowed רֶ֛שַׁע <WH7562> wickedness עַוְלָ֥תָה <WH5766> iniquity קְצַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH7114> ye have reaped אֲכַלְתֶּ֣ם <WH398> ye have eaten פְּרִי־ <WH6529> the fruit כָ֑חַשׁ <WH3585> of lies כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because בָטַ֥חְתָּ <WH982> because thou didst trust בְדַרְכְּךָ֖ <WH1870> in thy way בְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> in the multitude גִּבּוֹרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1368> of thy mighty men

וְקָ֣אם <WH6965> arise שָׁאוֹן֮ <WH7588> Therefore shall a tumult בְּעַמֶּךָ֒ <WH5971> among thy people וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מִבְצָרֶ֣יךָ <WH4013> and all thy fortresses יוּשַּׁ֔ד <WH7703> shall be spoiled כְּשֹׁ֧ד <WH7701> spoiled שַֽׁלְמַ֛ן <WH8020> as Shalman בֵּ֥ית אַֽרְבֵ֖אל <WH1009> Betharbel בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> of battle אֵ֥ם <WH517> the mother עַל־ <WH5921> with בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> upon [her] children רֻטָּֽשָׁה׃ <WH7376> was dashed in pieces

כָּ֗כָה <WH3602> So עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> do לָכֶם֙ בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> shall Bethel מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> unto you because רָעַ֣ת <WH7451> of your great רָֽעַתְכֶ֑ם <WH7451> wickedness בַּשַּׁ֕חַר <WH7837> in a morning נִדְמֹ֥ה <WH1820> utterly נִדְמָ֖ה <WH1820> be cut off מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> shall the king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
